description: Sticky BBQ sauce coats chicken drumsticks for a one-tray bake that pairs swimmingly with spring veggies and brown rice.
name: Smokey Drumsticks With Vegetable Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup F. Whitlock Smokey BBQ sauce
2 cups Birds Eye snap-frozen spring greens mix

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line a large baking tray with baking paper.
Add drumsticks and sauce to a large bowl and toss to combine. Place drumsticks in a single layer on prepared tray. Bake for 40 minutes, turning halfway, until golden and cooked through.
Add frozen vegetables to a large microwave-safe container. Cover and microwave on high for 2 minutes or until vegetables are cooked through.
Microwave rice according to package instructions. Divide rice, drumsticks and vegetables amongst plates to serve.
